metadata.name: SOBER
metadata.description:
Sober (2023) by Pwoseidon.

NFT holders have access to the track's stem files.  
(Hidden metadata stored permantently on Arweave.)

NFT holder may use the stem files as they please.  
(i.e. remix or incorporate into their own work, including for commercial purposes.)

Only the NFT holder has rights to this content.  
Multisignature and shared wallets shall not hold rights to the contents, only accounts belonging to an individual may hold these rights.

Upon sale or transfer of NFT, one forfeits the rights to this content and may no longer use it as they please.  
(If you plan to use the stems and release the content, best practice is to hold this NFT without selling or transferring to others.)

NFT owners may be asked to produce valid evidence of ownership in the court of law, if copyrights claims surface.

Note: some UK internet service providers may block access to Arweave services. In such an event, please use a VPN service to access the track stems stored on Arweave.
